de.codescape.bitvunit.rule
Class AbstractRule

java.lang.Object
  de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.AbstractRule
All Implemented Interfaces:
Rule
Direct Known Subclasses:
AlternativeTextForAppletRule, AlternativeTextForAreaOfImageMapRule, AlternativeTextForImageButtonRule, AlternativeTextForImageRule, AlternativeTextForInlineFrameRule, AlternativeTextForLinkedImageRule, AlternativeTextForObjectRule, AnchorsWithoutTargetAttributeRule, AvoidBlinkTextRule, AvoidBoldTagRule, AvoidItalicTagRule, AvoidMarqueeTextRule, AvoidMetaRefreshRule, AvoidServerSideImageMapRule, CaptionTextForTableRule, DefinitionListContainsItemsRule, FieldsetContainsLegendRule, HeadingContainsTextRule, HeadingsInCorrectOrderRule, LabelContainsTextRule, LabelForInputFieldRule, LabelForSelectTagRule, LabelForTextareaRule, LabelWithoutFormElementRule, LanguageForHtmlTagRule, OrderedListContainsListItemsRule, TableHeaderContainsTextRule, TableHeaderForTableColumnRule, TitleForAbbreviationTagRule, TitleForAcronymTagRule, TitleForFrameRule, TitleForInlineFrameRule, TitleForPageRule, UniqueLabelForFormElementRule, UnorderedListContainsListItemsRule
public abstract class AbstractRule
extends Object
implements Rule

Base class to all implementations of the Rule interface. It provides convenience methods to create new Violation instances within the implementation of a Rule and allows to apply a Rule to a given HtmlPage object.

Author:
Stefan Glase
